# groups edit

Edit a user group

## Usage

```console
coder groups edit <name>
```

## Options

### --add-users, -a

Add users to the group. Accepts emails or IDs.

### --avatar-url, -u

Update the group avatar.

### --name, -n

Update the group name.

### --rm-users, -r

Remove users to the group. Accepts emails or IDs.
